about_the_game:
This is an adventure game about the planet KONKORD, which has been overrun by dangerous creatures. You go to the planet to free it. There are more than 15 kinds of weapons, ammo, armor and life restoring medicines scattered all over the planet.

The mechanics of the game allows for easy targeting, all you have to do is look in the right direction. Be careful with the water, you can't jump out of the water and it also slows you down.



You run fast, but some monsters can catch up with you and cause damage.
There are many monsters and they are all different characteristics. Some have good armor and some are very fast and can cause a lot of damage.



You will fight day and night, and nights are very cold and you have to make bonfires not to die of cold.



You can take your friends with you and clear the planet of monsters together. Weapons, armor, medicine, etc. appear separately for each player. But be careful, you can injure or kill your friend. Also in Death Match mode you can train by hunting each other. Each of the players can turn into items for camouflage.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM

short_description: KONKORD is a planet overrun by mad creatures. Free the planet by destroying the creatures with various weapons you find along the way.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Japanese
